name: Life on Earth
description:
Life on Earth is a sci-fi adventure game based on the idea that life is a vacation. 

You can choose to play young, middle-aged, or old. When you start playing it is the last day of your life.

Life on Earth is inspired by films and series like The Twilight Zone and Black Mirrors.

Controls

W,A,S,D + Mouse = Move
E + Left Mouse Button = Interact
Escape or P = Pause
Tab = Objective
